# iru_device_action_rename (Action)

Renames a specific device. This is an imperative action.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_rename" "example" {
  device_id = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
  new_name  = "MacBook Pro - IT"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
- `new_name` (String) The new name for the device.
